DOC.detailed_description: This phase I , dose-escalation study melphalan bortezomib follow phase II study . Patients receive melphalan intravenously ( IV ) continuously day -5 -2 bortezomib IV 3-5 second day -4 -1 . Patients also receive dexamethasone IV day -1 prior second dose bortezomib . Beginning two day completion melphalan infusion , patient undergo autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplant . Eligible patient may undergo second transplant 2-4 month completion first transplant . After completion study treatment , patient follow monthly least 1 year every 3-6 month thereafter .
